scripts.serve:app-contratti: yarn run preset:customer --project app-contratti && yarn run postcss --project app-contratti && yarn run ng serve --project app-contratti --port 5200 --live-reload false --configuration development
scripts.serve:app-programmi: yarn run preset:customer --project app-programmi && yarn run postcss --project app-programmi && yarn run ng serve --project app-programmi --port 5300 --live-reload false --configuration development
scripts.build:app-contratti: yarn run preset:customer --project app-contratti --customer default --projectType sa --environmentType production && yarn run postcss --project app-contratti && yarn run ng build --project app-contratti --configuration production --base-href ./ && yarn run minify:json --project app-contratti
scripts.build:app-programmi: yarn run preset:customer --project app-programmi --customer default --projectType sa --environmentType production && yarn run postcss --project app-programmi && yarn run ng build --project app-programmi --configuration production --base-href ./ && yarn run minify:json --project app-programmi
scripts.assets:app-contratti: yarn run preset:customer --project app-contratti && yarn run postcss --project app-contratti && yarn run compile:assets --project app-contratti && yarn run minify:json --project app-contratti
scripts.assets:app-programmi: yarn run preset:customer --project app-programmi && yarn run postcss --project app-programmi && yarn run compile:assets --project app-programmi && yarn run minify:json --project app-programmi
